title: Court order prevents protestors from entering several Colombo streets on Saturday (28)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Fort Magistrate’s Court has issued an order against protestors from entering several roads in Colombo on Saturday (28).
Accordingly, protestors are not permitted to enter York Street, Janadhipathi Mawatha, Bank of Ceylon Mawatha, Chatham Street in Colombo.
In addition they are not allowed to forcibly enter or cause damage to any government institution or building located within the Fort Police Jurisdiction.
Court order prevents protestors from entering several Colombo streets on Saturday (28)
Cops rounding up peaceful protestors; SJB writes to IGP demanding end to arrests
